General.Name: Feitian Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Feitian Technologies Co., Ltd. provides authentication and transaction security solutions for secure online banking and transaction security worldwide. It offers OTP display, chip embedded, and fingerprint cards; FIDO2 security key to encrypt, store, and protect fingerprint data; FIDO U2F, a security key for supporting USB, NFC, and BLE communications; mobile payment terminals; PKI identification products; OTP authentication products; smart card readers; smart card OS, a java card operating system; software protection products; cloud based service platform; and BlockChain, a cryptocurrency wallet. The company also provides turnkey solution, which includes secure hardware, operating systems, middleware, software application, and services, such as personalization and remote lifecycle management. The company's customers include financial institutions, as well as telecom, government, and business enterprises. Feitian Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
